mapper.select: select oid,position,(select categoryName from positioncategory as p where p.pcid = o.pcid) positionCategory, startTime,duration,maxFlow,averageFlow,video,(select schemeName from scheme as s where s.sid = o.sid) scheme,numberOfSecurity from outliers as o where position like '%${value}'
select position,count(*) as outbreaks from outliers where position like '${value}%' group by position order by outbreaks desc
select (select categoryName from positioncategory p where o.pcid = p.pcid) category,count(*) outbreaks from outliers o group by pcid
